column1: The Pit Room////2 stars for the the barbecue sauce
column2: it was good. Service was good. Food was trash. Ordered the beef rib and brisket... beef rib was a little salty. Brisket wasn't too bad. Ordered the beans and Mac and cheese. The beans were definitely not bbq beans
column3: they were more like taqueria beans. Mac and cheese was plain. At least the lemonade tasted homemade but it was still on the sour side. I've had a lot better so this wasn't really worth my 60$.
